Index.title: Quality and reliability for your needs
Index.s1title: Vapno Group: Your reliable partner in the industry!
Index.s1text: Welcome to the website of the company that offers the highest quality lime production! With our experience and diligent approach, we provide our customers with reliability and efficiency in every drop of our products. Regardless of your task - construction, agriculture or industrial needs - we offer a wide range of high-quality lime that meets the highest quality standards. Trust our experts and see for yourself the impeccable quality of our products!
Index.s4textItem1: At each stage of production, we control product quality in accordance with the requirements of DSTU.
Index.s4textItem2: Every year, lime undergoes radiation control and a sanitary-epidemiological examination.
Index.s4textItem3: The lime is automatically packed into bags. So, if the deviation from the weight exceeds the legal norms, the bag is immediately removed from the line as a defect.
Index.s7title: The main stages of checking the quality of lime:
Index.s7titleItem3: Evaluation of lime quality and compliance with standards:
Index.s7textItem1: The first stage of quality control involves evaluating the physical characteristics of the lime. This may include parameters such as particle size, structure and texture. The main methods for testing the physical characteristics of lime include measuring particle size using sieves and microscopes, as well as determining porosity and density.
Index.s7textItem2: The second stage of quality control includes the analysis of the chemical composition and purity of the lime. This includes the determination of the content of the main components of the lime, such as limestone (CaCO3), impurities and impurities. Methods of chemical analysis include the use of spectroscopy, chromatography and other analytical methods.
Index.s7textItem3: After analyzing the physical characteristics of lime and its chemical composition, a conclusion can be drawn about the quality of the product and its compliance with quality standards. Compliance with established norms and requirements guarantees that lime will be effective and safe to use for various industries where it is used. Thus, a thorough the analysis of each stage of inspection ensures the reliability and quality of the product, which is important for achieving success in construction, agriculture and industry.
Index.name: Your name
Index.footerText: Over a decade of successful work in the field of lime production, we have gained invaluable experience and recognition in the market. We are proud of our products and are always open to cooperation with new customers and partners. Choose quality and reliability with us, and we guarantee you high quality products and excellent service.
Index.good1Descr: Unslaked lime for construction works and other industrial sectors
Index.good1DetailDescr: Produced from high-calcium lime burnt in a rotary kiln at high temperature on German equipment, ground completely to residue on sieve No. 0.08 to 0.5%. Allows consumers to buy water but use everything without residues and waste, which is economically advantageous. Since the bag's content is used 100%. Unslaked lime is used in construction to obtain lime paste, which is used in mixes, improving their technological properties and increasing the mix's water retention ability. Lime mixes are elastic, vapor-permeable, and protect walls from rapid deterioration.
Index.good11Descr: Unslaked lime 5 kg for construction works and other industrial sectors
Index.good11DetailDescr: Made from high-calcium lime fired in a rotary kiln at high temperature on German equipment, ground completely to a residue on sieve # 0.08 to 0.5%. Allows the consumer to buy water and use everything without residues and waste, which is economically beneficial. Since the content of the bag is used 100%. Unslaked lime is used in construction to obtain lime paste, which is used in solutions, improves their technological properties, and increases the ability of the solution to retain water. Lime solutions are elastic, vapor-permeable, and protect walls from rapid deterioration.
Index.good2Descr: Limestone putty (extra slaked) for preparing lime and cement-lime mortar mixtures for plastering, masonry, and decoration
Index.good2DetailDescr: High-quality limestone putty (extra slaked) is an ideal choice for preparing various lime and cement-lime mixtures. It is used in construction for plastering, masonry, and decoration, allowing for the creation of strong and durable structures. Extra slaked limestone putty has properties that improve workability and ensure high-quality performance in the construction industry.
Index.good3Descr: Agricultural lime for soil acidification 25 kg
Index.good3DetailDescr: Agricultural lime is an integral component of modern agriculture. Using this material helps to increase soil fertility, provide an optimal environment for plant growth, and improve productivity. Lime neutralizes soil acidity, which enhances the absorption of essential nutrients by plant roots. Additionally, it reduces the risk of diseases and pests that can damage crops. The application of agricultural lime is an important step in maintaining environmentally friendly and productive agriculture.
Index.good31Descr: Agricultural lime for soil acidification 5 kg
Index.good31DetailDescr: Agricultural lime is an integral component of modern agriculture. Using this material helps to increase soil fertility, provide an optimal environment for plant growth, and improve productivity. Lime neutralizes soil acidity, which enhances the absorption of essential nutrients by plant roots. Additionally, it reduces the risk of diseases and pests that can damage crops. The application of agricultural lime is an important step in maintaining environmentally friendly and productive agriculture.
Index.good4DetailDescr: VamActive Lime is an environmentally friendly granular oxide lime obtained by calcination, grinding, and granulation of limestone, with calcium oxide (CaO) as the main component. The main active ingredient is CaO (min. 90%), fraction 3-8 mm, which is in an easily accessible form for plants unlike carbonate forms (CaCO3) that dissolve over 2-4 years. VamActive actively reacts with water, neutralizing soil acidity. Liming is required for plowing, gardens, greenhouses, meadows of podzolic, chernozem, and red soil types.
